entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy. High plus 2 with temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High plus 2 with temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries ending after midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning then sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light late in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 late in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
